name: Charlie Morris
story: Charlie Morris was born and raised in a small village in the south of Europe. He joined the military right after finishing high school as he wanted to serve his country and protect his fellow citizens. Charlie is a hardworking and dedicated individual who always puts the needs of others above his own. He has spent the last few years working as a Combat Life Saver in the army, helping his fellow soldiers on and off the battlefield. Charlie is married with two children, a son and a daughter.
